title: Why?
body: Why the hell is riot so goddamn caught up in making every fucking champion having the ability to delete people in under a second, AND have all the mobility/safety you could ever want.  WHY ARE THERE SO MANY CHAMPS LIKE THIS?  WHY IS THIS OK?

replies.body: I learned pretty early on that any champ that gets fed can delete people in under a second. Literally almost any champ.
Fucking nami can one shot if she is fed enough
